experiences.title: FullStack Developer
experiences.description: During the project, I designed and implemented modules that expanded system capabilities and enhanced the user experience. I led the backend migration and optimization to Laravel with Octane, significantly boosting performance and reducing response times. By applying SOLID principles, I ensured clean, scalable, and maintainable code. I also maintained vanilla PHP applications—fixing bugs and improving stability—and implemented Elasticsearch to optimize search relevance and speed. Finally, I collaborated on defining requirements and planning new features aligned with business objectives.

experiences.title: FullStack Developer
experiences.description: I built a SPA from scratch using Laravel 9 as a RESTful API and Quasar Framework with Vue.js on the frontend, achieving a dynamic, modular, and highly responsive interface. I integrated Stripe to handle collections, authorizations, and webhooks for secure payments and a seamless user experience. I also automated daily tasks with Linux cronjobs to ensure timely, flawless execution. Finally, I planned and designed the entity‑relationship model in MySQL, structuring optimized schemas to guarantee data integrity and high query performance.

experiences.title: Backend Developer
experiences.description: I developed from scratch a REST API in Laravel 7 to be consumed by both a SPA and a mobile app, designing scalable endpoints to meet the requirements of each platform. I implemented authentication with Laravel Sanctum, managing tokens and securing API routes for both the SPA and the mobile app. Finally, I managed Linux cronjobs to automate backups, log cleaning, and report generation.

experiences.title: Trainee Developer
experiences.description: I built a help desk ticketing system from scratch using PHP vanilla and MySQL, with MVC pattern.
